title: Himi 181
lyrics:
8’s & 6’s
1.
Ko e ‘etau ngaahi mamahi
‘Oku tau fa’a mo’ua ai,
Kuo tei ‘osi,
Pea te tau ‘alu hake,
Fakataha mo e Eiki.
Ki he lelei lahi.
2.
‘E vave ‘etau mamata,
Ki he fofonga totonu,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e fofonga ko ia,
‘E fonu ai kotoa pē,
‘I he fiefia.
3.
Ko e ataata ongo,
‘O hēvani kotoa pē,
‘E fonu ai ia,
Pea ‘e mafola atu,
Ke mama’o, fai ma’u ai pē,
Hono ongolelei.
4.
Pea ‘oku fakataha,
‘A e Toko Tolu Tapu,
Ke fakakātoa,
‘A e lelei, ‘atautolu,
Pea tau punou fulipē,
Ki hono lalo va’e.
5.
Pea longolongo ‘Eiki
Pea lelei lahi hake,
Pea malu ia
‘A hēvani kotoa pē,
Pea mānava loloa,
Pea mālie ai.
6.
Sīsū, ‘i he’emau tui
Pea ‘amanaki lelei,
Ki he me’a pehē,
‘Oku mau kātaki ‘a e
Kolosi, ‘o tomape’e,
Ki ho lalo va’e.
7.
Ke ‘oua ke ke fakahā,
‘A ‘emau mo’ui fufū,
Mo ke fakafonu,
Homau loto fiefia,
‘I he ‘Otua totonu,
Ko e ‘Afiona. *
